content.value: Media Luna Baru is located 50 minutes away from Cartagena and can be reached by speedboat OR 4X4, depending of how many people go to the hostel. You will enjoy the privacy and peacefulness of our hostel, located in Isla Baru in a beautiful beach called Playa Bobo. We offer the service of transportation from Cartagena, be sure you book yours! (Better if you do it one day before your reservation) The meeting point is at Media Luna Cartagena every day at 8 am, departure is between 9am and 9:30am, and the return from Baru to Cartagena is between 3pm and 3.30pm.

Media Luna Baru has double level cottages with one room on each floor and one bathroom to share with fresh water. Enjoy comfortable beds in a 4 bed shared dorm. A number of activities are offered in the area, such as snorkeling and fishing. Isla del Rosario is 11 km from Media Luna Hostel Barú, while Isla Barú is 18 km from the property.

description.description: Media Luna Baru is a nice hostel that offers its own Bar, Restaurant, Volleyball field, kayaks, SUP´s, snorkels and private beach! Media Luna Hostel Barú is located in Barú, 36 km from Cartagena de Indias. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Rooms at Media Luna Hostel Barú include balcony and view. To reach the property, guests will need to take a boat from the dock in Cartagena or a pick up that that departs every morning and returns in the afternoon for an additional fee. There is a tour desk and shops at the property
